name: qbit-manage
description: qBitManage is a self-hosted utility for managing qBittorrent automatically. It handles categories, tags, and cleanup operations via API with simple config and CLI usage.

features.title: Automated Categorization
features.description: Organize torrents by content type, tracker, or custom rules to maintain a structured download library

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Apply and remove tags automatically based on torrent status, age, or seeding ratio for easier

features.title: Cleanup Operations
features.description: Remove stalled, orphaned, or completed torrents based on configurable criteria to free up disk space

features.title: Cross
features.description: Identify and manage duplicate content across multiple trackers to optimize seeding efficiency

features.title: Ratio Management
features.description: Monitor and enforce seeding ratios per tracker or category to meet private tracker requirements

features.title: Schedule Automation
features.description: Run management tasks on a cron schedule to keep your qBittorrent instance organized without manual

features.title: REST API
features.description: Connect directly to qBittorrent's Web API for real-time torrent management and status updates

features.title: Yaml Configuration
features.description: Define all rules and settings in a simple YAML file for version control and easy
